subject: Re: Even on Christmas
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
So far , this radio made with the older chip has the best audio, 
depite the fact that it doesn't even have a built in detector like the 
new chips. Now that I have the AM band working satifactorly, I can 
start on the two shortwave bands tomorrow. I have this board, and two 
others I'd like to get done over the holidays. Then I can take a break. 

 Happy new year!

Frank-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:

> Yeha, while waiting f ro the kids to dhow up this morning.
